I like how bsher put all his faces on one place:)
"The many incarnations of Saitou" 
PHOTOS section

I need to add that I just received "Saitou Hajime no subete" a newly 
published book on S.H. and *just like* the books by Shizuko Akama 
who seems to be the foremost (but not the only) person researching 
S.H. "Saitou Hajime no subete" also insists that S.H. is this man 
here:
http://www.3-hajime.com/hs3.jpg

and in all the books in Japanese I recently purchased...NONE have 
included the charcoal sketch which actually has his name written 
right next to his face
http://www.3-hajime.com/hs1.jpg

Again, this all begs the question that if these researchers have 
access to the Fujita family (e.g. Shizuko Akama) then perhaps the 
descendants must have an alternate photo/painting otherwise how 
could they i.d. him?  I cannot imagine the photographer tracking 
down each soldier and sending/giving him his own copy at a later 
time...it's not like they had polaroids back then:)
